title: Seeking  a Team.

replies.body:

>
> leaving.

No Please why you do this ;.;
we are looking for a top laner but, we are a bronze/silver team, and we are casually trying teams, let me know if your interested.
Are you still looking for a top later? if yes i might be interested. cheers IGN dafaq

> [{quoted}](name=WingDemoV,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=cTArt0EW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-09T02:57:56.768+0000)
>
> we are looking for a top laner but, we are a bronze/silver team, and we are casually trying teams, let me know if your interested.

Would be happy to :) Add me on league.

im not offering a team, but if you ever just want to duo in normals im always happy to help out and give constructive criticism.  I'm s1 in promos for gold ( i know thats not great) but we can always bounce ideas off each other to help improve.
Darth R2 add me if you want
